Hello Roberto,

 

Thank you for reaching out.

 

We do have a dataset with historical data dating back to 1995; however, it currently includes only Corn, Soybeans, and Wheat. Cotton data has not been included so far, as there hasn't been any prior request for it.

Subject: US planted and harvested estimates

 

Hi Saber,

 

Hope that you’re doing well!

 

We’re looking for historical (2000-2024) USDA’s acreage estimates (planted & harvested) for US corn, soybeans, wheat and cotton.

 

We’ve seen that USDA’s quickstats database has this data, but unfortunately they only provide a few recent years in database format.

 

I suspect that Dnext has already cleaned this data, could you please let us know if there is an existing dataset with this info? We need the state and national level estimates reported in USDA’s March survey (March estimate), the June survey (June estimate) and the final estimates.

 

 

Thanks for the help,

 

Rgds
